meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits the growth of fungi.
meanings.sent1: The fungistats in the spray helped protect the plants from fungal growth.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed a fungistats to treat the fungal infection on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent3: The fungistats worked like a shield against the invading fungi.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as a fungistats, halting the spread of negativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The fungistats acted as a guardian, keeping the fungi at bay.

meanings.definition: A medication used to prevent fungal infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a fungistats to prevent any fungal infections after the surgery.
meanings.sent2: She always carried a fungistats in her bag in case she encountered moldy environments.
meanings.sent3: The fungistats was like a superhero protecting the body from fungal villains.
meanings.sent4: His words were a fungistats for her soul, warding off any negativity.
meanings.sent5: The fungistats was a shield, defending against the fungal invaders.

meanings.definition: An agent that stops the spread of fungi.
meanings.sent1: The fungistats was sprayed on the walls to prevent the fungi from spreading further.
meanings.sent2: The fungistats was effective in halting the growth of mold in the damp basement.
meanings.sent3: The fungistats was like a superhero swooping in to stop the fungi in their tracks.
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted as a fungistats, stopping the negativity from spreading.
meanings.sent5: The fungistats was a barrier, preventing the fungi from advancing.
